祒字的基本解释

祒
tiáo
古人名用字。

祒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tiáo］
［《集韻》田聊切，平蕭，定。］
用于人名。《庄子·天运》有巫咸祒。陆德明释文：“郭音條……李云：'巫咸，殷相也。祒，寄名也。'”

祒字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【示字部】　祒； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页841第09
【集韻】田聊切，音迢。人名。巫咸祒。見【莊子】。　又【五音集韻】尺招切，音弨。又【集韻】市沼切，音紹。義?同。

祒字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
祒字的起名意思

古人名用字。

Basic explanation of words
Zhu
tiáo
Ancient names used words.
Zhu
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tiáo］
["Jiyun" Tian Liaoqie, Pingxiao, Ding. ]
Used for names. "Zhuangzi·Tianyun" has Wu Xianzhu. Lu Deming explained: "Guo Yintiao... Li Yun:'Wu Xian, Yin Xiangye. Zhu, send your name.'"
Zhu
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Set 2] [Shizi Department] 　祒; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 841 09
【Ji Yun】Tian talks and cuts, and the sound is lingering. Person's name. Wu Xianzhu. See [Zhuangzi].　[Five Yin Ji Yun] The ruler moves and cuts, and the sound prostitutes. Also 【Jiyun】shizhao cut, sound Shao. Righteous? Same.
Zhu
